mapper.select: SELECT MAX(trade_date) AS trade_date ,ts_code ,MAX(symbol) AS symbol ,MAX(name) AS name ,MAX(industry) AS industry ,MAX(open) AS open ,MAX(high) AS high ,MAX(low) AS low ,MAX(close) AS close ,MAX(pct_chg) AS pct_chg ,MAX(vol) AS vol ,MAX(amount) AS amount ,MIN(trade_date) AS second_high_date ,MIN(close) AS second_high_close FROM (SELECT trade_date ,ts_code ,symbol ,name ,industry ,open ,high ,low ,close ,vol ,pct_chg ,amount FROM ( SELECT ts_code ,trade_date ,amount ,open ,high ,low ,close ,vol ,pct_chg ,name ,industry ,symbol ,rank() over(PARTITION BY ts_code ORDER BY close DESC) AS rank_num FROM ( SELECT a.ts_code ,a.trade_date ,a.amount ,a.open ,a.high ,a.low ,a.close ,a.vol ,a.pct_chg ,b.name ,b.industry ,b.symbol FROM stock_hfq_daily AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code ,name ,industry ,symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market = '主板' ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE a.trade_date BETWEEN date_format(date_sub(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interval 2 year),'%Y%m%d') AND #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS a ) AS a WHERE a.rank_num IN (1, 2) -- 取历史最高和第二高 ) AS a GROUP BY ts_code HAVING MAX(trade_date) = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 限制这一天的股票是近2年新高 ORDER BY second_high_date,amount DESC

SELECT a.ts_code ,a.trade_date ,a.amount ,a.open ,a.high ,a.low ,a.close ,a.vol ,a.pct_chg ,a.name ,a.industry ,a.symbol FROM ( SELECT a.ts_code ,a.trade_date ,a.amount ,a.open ,a.high ,a.low ,a.close ,a.vol ,a.pct_chg ,b.name ,b.industry ,b.symbol FROM stock_hfq_daily AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code ,name ,industry ,symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market = '主板' ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE a.trade_date = #{date, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND a.close > a.pre_close ) AS a JOIN ( SELECT a.ts_code ,MAX(a.close) AS max_close FROM stock_hfq_daily AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code ,name ,industry ,symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market = '主板' ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE a.trade_date BETWEEN date_format(date_sub(#{date, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, interval 2 year), '%Y%m%d') AND #{date, jdbcType = VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.ts_code ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE b.max_close > a.close AND (b.max_close-a.close)/a.close <= #{threshold, jdbcType = DOUBLE} ORDER BY a.amount DESC
